creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: teapot with large flared handle and upward arching spout on opposite side; flatted sides, forming an overall rounded cube shape that leans slightly forward; four feet; burnt orange color with iridescent speckled glazing at the top of teapot, and moves downward; small circular lid with fin-shaped knob
markings: impressed maker\'s mark on side of foot to R of handle: JO
medium: Stoneware, wood-fired with shino glaze, thrown and altered
title: Teapot
